bibl.title: Decisional Practices of Private Associations in Ptolemaic and Early Roman Egypt.
Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013.

bibl.seg: Mario C.D. Paganini, Decisional Practices of Private Associations in Ptolemaic and Early Roman Egypt.
